title: Samples From Malmaison, 1804
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: Satin stitch on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: label by upper sample,"The sample of the curtain used at Malmaison. From the collection of B. Brocard sucessor to Piot, Brodereur de l'Empereur". label by lower sample, " Original design and material used in a robe for Empress Josephine. From the collection of B. Brocard, sucessor to Piot, Brodereur de l'Empereur 1804".
description: Mat with two fabric samples. The upper sample is embroidery using stamped silver metal on white cotton (floral shapes). The lower sample is an embroidery using white silk on aqua silk in an acanthus leaf design. The mat has been painted and gold leaf applied.

tombstone.epitaph:
Samples From Malmaison, 1804.
1804. Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: Satin stitch on plain weave foundation.. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-564-a,b.
